title: Star Guardian Lux?
body: Umm, I don't think that's how it's supposed to work?

replies.body: it is because you dont have the champ, so they bundle them together
Yep - if you purchase the champ (with IP or RP) separately,  it'll automatically deduct from that price, leaving you with the sale price of the champion.
Wait, I dont remember the base price being 2140
it's because OP doesn't own lux.
